sense.gloss: to enter, to come in, to go in, to get in, to arrive
to join (a club, company, etc.), to enter (a university, the army, etc.), to enroll (in), to go into (e.g. politics), to get into
to be contained (in), to be included (in), to be inside (e.g. a box), to come under (a heading), to belong (in a category)
to (be able to) fit (in a container, building, etc.), to be (able to be) held, to be (able to be) accommodated
to be introduced, to be brought in, to be installed
to be received, to be obtained
to be scored (of points), to be won (of votes)
to turn on, to start functioning, to start working
to enter (a month, season, etc.), to reach (e.g. a climax), to get to (e.g. the main topic), to enter into (e.g. negotiations), to start (doing), to begin
to form (of a crack, fissure, etc.), to develop
to be put in (of effort, spirit, feeling, etc.), to be applied (e.g. of strength)
to be ready (of tea, coffee, etc.), to be made
to enter the body (of alcohol), to become drunk
entrance, entry, gate, approach, mouth
going in and out, entering and exiting
visiting regularly, frequenting, having regular dealings with
income and expenditure, incomings and outgoings
increase and decrease, surplus and deficit, fluctuation
fight, trouble, quarrel, dispute
indentations (e.g. of a coastline)
creeping at night into a woman's bedroom, stealing into a girl's bedroom at night to make love, sneaking visit
to go into, to come into, to penetrate, to get in, to step in (a house)
to become complicated
sidewise crawl (e.g. of a crab), crawling sideways
leafhopper (insect), jassid
sidewinder (Crotalus cerastes)
x: ヨコバイガラガラヘビ

sense.gloss: levelling off (of prices, etc.), stabilizing
to crawl, to creep, to go on all fours
to slither, to wriggle
to trail (of vines, flowers, etc.), to spread, to creep
crawling on all fours, getting on one's hands and knees, falling flat
creeping pine
crawling (of a baby), creeping

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑山道↑↓さんどう↓をまるでアリが↑這↑↓は↓うように↑進↑↓すす↓んだ。
sdata.e: We crawled like so many ants along the mountain pass.

sdata.j: マルさんはテーブルの↑下↑↓した↓から↑這↑↓は↓い↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: Maru crawled out from under the table.

sdata.j: その↑男↑↓おとこ↓の↑子↑↓こ↓はテレビを↑見↑↓み↓ながら↑腹這↑↓はらば↓いに↑寝↑↓ね↓そべっていた。
sdata.e: The boy was lying on his stomach watching TV.

sdata.j: ↑赤↑↓あか↓ちゃんは↑四↑↓よ↓つん↑這↑↓ば↓いになってはっていた。
sdata.e: The baby was crawling on all fours.

sdata.j: ↑赤↑↓あか↓ちゃんは↑部屋↑↓へや↓に↑這↑↓は↓ってきた。
sdata.e: The baby crept into the room.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑四↑↓よ↓つん↑這↑↓ば↓いになって、↑指輪↑↓ゆびわ↓を↑探↑↓さが↓し↑始↑↓はじ↓めた。
sdata.e: He got down on all fours and started searching for the ring.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑足↑↓あし↓に↑何↑↓なに↓かが↑這↑↓は↓い↑上↑↓あ↓がってくるのを↑感↑↓かん↓じた。
sdata.e: He felt something crawl up his leg.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らの↑赤↑↓あか↓ちゃんはちょうど↑這↑↓は↓い↑始↑↓はじ↓めたところです。
sdata.e: Their baby has just started to crawl.

sdata.j: ほふく↑前進↑↓ぜんしん↓はもっと↑素早↑↓すばや↓くゴキブリのように↑這↑↓は↓え！
sdata.e: Crawl forward is done much more agilely - scuttle like a cockroach!

sdata.j: そのミミズが↑這↑↓は↓ったような↑字↑↓じ↓、↑読↑↓よ↓み↑難↑↓にく↓いんだけど。
sdata.e: That's a squiggle, not legible handwriting.
